contentrichtext.text: {{Cite check|date=April 2012}} {{Infobox musical artist |name = Yıldız Tilbe |background = solo_singer |image = |birth_name = Yıldız Tilbe |birth_date = {{birth date and age|1966|7|16}} |birth_place = [[İzmir]], [[Turkey]] |genre = [[Pop-folk]] |occupation = Singer |years_active = 1991–present |website = }} '''Yıldız Tilbe''' (born 16 July 1966) is a turkish pop folk singer and one of the best selling musical artists in Turkey,{{Citation needed|date=April 2012}} known especially for her eastern-infused ballads. ==Early life and career== Yıldız Tilbe is of Kurdish descent. Her father is from [[Ağrı]] and her mother is from [[Tunceli]].<ref>[http://www.biyografi.info/kisi/yildiz-tilbe Yıldız Tilbe Biyografi.info<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref> While performing at a nightclub in 1991, she met [[Sezen Aksu]].{{Citation needed|date=April 2012}} For some time, she worked as a backing singer and collaborated with several other artists on their music projects. Yıldız released her debut album ''Delikanlım'' in 1994 and songs from this and later albums received significant airplay and sold well in both Turkey and internationally.{{Citation needed|date=April 2012}} ==Discography== {{BLP sources section|date=April 2012}} {| class="wikitable" !Year !Title (Turkish) !Title (English) !Sales |- |1994 |''[[Delikanlım]]'' |My Boy |3,500,000+<ref>[http://www.milliyet.com.tr/2000/04/12/magazin/mag02.html Milliyet Magazin Sayfalari<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref> |- |1995 |''Dillere Destan'' |A Legendary Story | |- |1996 |''Aşkperest'' |Love Obsessed |290,000 |- |1998 |''Salla Gitsin Dertlerini'' |Let Your Worries Go | |- |2001 |''Gülüm'' |My Rose | |- |2002 |''Haberi Olsun'' |Let Him Know |1,200,000+ |- |2003 |''Yürü Anca Gidersin'' | |2,000,000+ |- |2004 |''Yıldız'dan Türküler'' |Folk Songs From Yıldız |650.000+<ref name="mu-yap.org">[http://www.mu-yap.org/getdata.asp?PID=252 MÜ-YAP Bağlantılı Hak Sahibi Fonogram Yapımcıları Meslek Birliği<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref> |- |2004 |''Sevdiğime Hiç Pişman Olmadım'' |Never Regretted Loving You |380,000<ref name="mu-yap.org" /> |- |2005 |''[[Papatya Baharı]]'' |Camomile Spring |300,000<ref name="mu-yap.org" /> |- |2006 |''Tanıdım Seni'' |Now I Know You |150,000<ref name="mu-yap.org" /> |- |2008 |''[[Güzel]]'' |Beautiful |123,000 |- |2009 |''[[Aşk İnsanı Değiştirir]]'' |Love Will Change Man |100,000+ |- |2010 |''[[Hastayım Sana]]'' |Crazy for You | |- |2011 |''Oynama'' |Do Not Play | |- |2013 |''Dünden Bugüne Arabesk'' | |} ==References== {{Reflist}}
